article.title: Northrop Grumman Receives Army Information Operations Award
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Northrop Grumman Corporation has received a contract from the U.S. Army to continue providing full-spectrum information operations and computer networks operations to the 1st Information Operations Command and its regional computer emergency response teams. The single award is valued at $430 million over five years if all options are exercised.
